name: Examples of APPEND and NCONC clauses

sections.type: Examples of APPEND and NCONC clauses
sections.text:
;; Use APPEND to concatenate some sublists.
       (loop for x in '((a) (b) ((c)))
             append x)
     =>  (A B (C))
     ;; NCONC some sublists together.  Note that only lists made by the
     ;; call to LIST are modified.
       (loop for i upfrom 0
             as x in '(a b (c))
             nconc (if (evenp i) (list x) nil))
     =>  (A (C))

_otext:
